items.title: Researcher Is Feared Dead After Falling Into a Glacial Stream in Alaska
items.summary: The water pushed the man into a hole in the ice that suddenly filled with a torrent of water. He hasn’t been seen since.

items.title: Man Accused of Killing Israeli Embassy Staffers Pleads Not Guilty
items.summary: At an arraignment on Thursday, Elias Rodriguez faced federal hate crime and other charges that could result in the death penalty.

items.title: Justice Dept. Opens Criminal Inquiry Into Lisa Cook, Elevating Trump’s Claims
items.summary: The move was instigated by Ed Martin, a Trump loyalist who has said it is legitimate for officials to publicly air criminal investigations into people targeted by the president.

items.title: Northwestern’s President Will Resign After University Faced Republican Pressure
items.summary: The president, Michael Schill, will step down after months of turbulence, including Trump administration cuts of $790 million to the university’s research funds.

items.title: Trump’s L.A. Military Deployment Cost $120 Million So Far, Newsom Says
items.summary: The figure reflects the cost of the deployment since June 7, when President Trump ordered National Guard soldiers and Marines to Los Angeles to quell immigration protests.

items.title: D.C. Sues Trump Administration Over Deployment of National Guard
items.summary: The city is challenging the federal government’s authority to send troops into the city for what the president has called a “public safety emergency.”

items.title: RFK Jr grilled in tense hearing about chaos at federal health agencies and vaccines – live updates
items.summary: <p>Trump’s health secretary faces tough questions on about department layoffs and budget cuts amid scrutiny over his plans to ‘make America healthy again’</p><p><strong>Health secretary Robert F</strong><strong> Kennedy Jr</strong><strong> will appear before a congressional committee on Thursday, where he’s expected to face questions about turmoil at federal health agencies.</strong></p><p>The US Senate finance committee has called Kennedy to a hearing about his plans to “Make America Healthy Again”.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/sep/04/donald-trump-tariffs-immigration-technology-epstein-us-politics-live-news-updates">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: President of Northwestern University quits amid layoffs forced by Trump cuts
items.summary: <p>Michael H Schill led the institution for three years, during which Trump administration slashed nearly $800m</p><p>The president of Northwestern University said Thursday that he was stepping down amid a turbulent period marked by clashes with Republican lawmakers and steep federal funding cuts under the <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/trump-administration">Trump administration</a> that forced widespread layoffs.</p><p>Michael H Schill, who has led the institution for three years, has been under heavy scrutiny in conservative circles this year. The Trump administration slashed nearly $800m in research funding after sustained criticism from Republicans.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/04/northwestern-university-president-resigns-trump-cuts">Continue reading...</a>
